title: **1st MONTH FREE** Stylish North Austin Luxury Apartments
posting_body: *After the one month free this unit has a prorated rent of $2,309*
Check out this brand-new luxury apartment building in North Austin near La Fronterra!
Less than a $9 Uber to the Domain
They offer multiple co-working spaces so those of you who work from home can get out of your apartment when you need to!
They have an amazing fitness center with multiple rooms including a bike studio and yoga studio.
So you can go ahead and cancel your current gym membership, you won't need it!
They also have a huge dog park on the property for all your four-legged friends.
*Select unit even have privately fenced-in back yards*
These specials won't last long so hit me up today!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
